description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Adventures of Robinson Crusoe ... Newly edited after the original editions. With twenty illustrations by Kauffman. [Parts 1 and 2, abridged. With an introduction signed: S. R. B.]", "Major Single Works. Robinson Crusoe. Abridgments and Adaptations" Author: Defoe, Daniel Contributor: B., S. R. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 12604.i.8." Fisher Unwin Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000892479 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
